columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique ID of this Domain.

columns.name: domain
columns.description: The domain this Domain represents. These must be unique in our system; you cannot have two Domains representing the same domain.

columns.name: axfr_ips
columns.description: The list of IPs that may perform a zone transfer for this Domain. This is potentially dangerous, and should be set to an empty list unless you intend to use it.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description for this Domain. This is for display purposes only.

columns.name: domain_type
columns.description: If this Domain represents the authoritative source of information for the domain it describes, or if it is a read-only copy of a master (also called a slave).

columns.name: expire_sec
columns.description: The amount of time in seconds that may pass before this Domain is no longer authoritative.

columns.name: master_ips
columns.description: The IP addresses representing the master DNS for this Domain.

columns.name: refresh_sec
columns.description: The amount of time in seconds before this Domain should be refreshed.

columns.name: retry_sec
columns.description: The interval, in seconds, at which a failed refresh should be retried.

columns.name: soa_email
columns.description: Start of Authority email address. This is required for master Domains.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Used to control whether this Domain is currently being rendered: disabled, active, edit_mode, has_errors.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: Tags applied to this domain as a map.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: List of Tags applied to this domain.

columns.name: ttl_sec
columns.description: Time to Live - the amount of time in seconds that this Domain's records may be cached by resolvers or other domain servers.
